ingredients: 4 cups apricot halves,   +   1/4 cup white sugar,   +   3/4 cup brown sugar,   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup butter,   +   3/4 cup rolled oats
nutrition: Total Fat 17g 21%, Saturated Fat 10g 50%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 116mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 52g 19%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 36g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 10mg 52%, Calcium 40mg 3%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 344mg 7%
